description: This Java source file defines a REST controller class 'HelloController' for a Spring Boot application. It provides several API endpoints including a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for the devdiarybackend application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when the root URL is accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a health check endpoint that returns 'OK'.
